__e: 'My dearest children, 'I know this comes as a shock to you, and for that, I'm deeply sorry.
Me, my three beautiful children and my husband.
"My dear children, I haven't seen you for a long time.
"Dear fellas, I'm sorry, but... You should go back to your real home in the forest."
Not just from myself but from... f-from my dear friends who would've given anything to be here today.
